overview: Jame Joyce once said of Ulysses, that if Dublin City would disappear from the earth tomorrow, it could be recreated from the pages of his book. This Unique short documentary will take anyone willing to dive into its pages on a geographical tour of the exact locations of Ulysses. One hundred years after the 16th of June 1904 we walk with Bloom through the landscape of the greatest book ever penned.
title: A Stroll Thro Ulysses
